attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To raise awareness of Pcos ( polycystic ovaries) in the UK and get more doctors trained to understand this complex condition that affects 1 in 10 women in the uk. To offer support on the NHS for nutrition, dietary advice, support groups, counselling tailored to the needs of those women suffering with the condition, like america do.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
